name: .XMV File Extension
summary: Learn about .XMV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Video file used by some games for the Xbox console system; uses a format developed by Microsoft specifically for playback on the Xbox; typically converted from a .WMV file to the XMV format using xmvtool, a program included with the Xbox software development kit provided by Microsoft.

content: An open source program called Microsoft XMV demuxer can be used to demux XMV files. This program is distributed as part of FFmpeg in the source code file xmv.c.

windows.name: Open and view .XMV files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
